DzBrickParamMime Class Reference
[Rendering Classes]

Class type reperesenting the mime type for a brick param. This mime type encodes a pointer and is only valid in DAZ Studio. More...

#include <dzbrickparam.h>

Detailed Description

Class type reperesenting the mime type for a brick param. This mime type encodes a pointer and is only valid in DAZ Studio.

See also:
DzShaderBrick
